content: @Grahame Grieve is there a way to get a 'summary' version of a CapabilityStatement that just lists the important bits and skips the text section? Some servers are returning payloads north of 650K and a lot of that is just text that I never plan to display.

See http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/search.html#summary

_summary=data (providing the server supports it of course)
@Richard Kavanagh exactly what I needed, thanks!
